languages.text: {n}Леди Кассия неуверенно осматривает массивный станок для вышивания, уже заправленный тончайшим шелком и золотыми нитями. При вашем приближении она испуганно отдергивает руку, и острые когти безжалостно вспарывают прозрачную ткань.{/n} "Ах, {name}, вы уже здесь. Я... хотела поблагодарить вас за сей неожиданный подарок. Вышивание... никогда не занималась подобным. Выглядит весьма... интересно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Леди Кассия неуверенно осматривает массивный станок для вышивания, уже заправленный тончайшим шелком и золотыми нитями. При вашем приближении она испуганно одергивает руку, и острые когти безжалостно вспарывают прозрачную ткань.{/n} "Ах {name}, вы уже здесь. Я... хотела поблагодарить вас за сей неожиданный подарок. Вышивание... никогда не занималась подобным. Выглядит весьма... интересно".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia is tentatively examining the large embroidery machine already loaded with the finest silk and gold thread. As you approach, she jerks her hand away in fright, and her sharp claws slice the translucent fabric.{/n} "Ah, {name}, you are here already. I... wanted to thank you for this unexpected gift. Embroidery... I have never engaged in anything of this sort before. It looks... most curious."

languages.text: {n}卡西娅正小心翼翼地摆弄那台已经填满了上好丝绸与金线的大型刺绣机。听到你走近的脚步，她猛地缩回了手，尖利的指甲划破了薄如蝉翼的面料。{/n}“啊，{name}，你来了。我……我想谢谢你送给我这么一份意外的大礼。刺绣，我从来没有尝试过刺绣。这真是……太有意思了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia is tentatively examining the large embroidery machine already loaded with the finest silk and gold thread. As you approach, she jerks her hand away in fright, and her sharp claws slice the translucent fabric.{/n} "Ah, {name}, you are here already. I... wanted to thank you for this unexpected gift. Embroidery... I have never engaged in anything of this sort before. It looks... most curious."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅正小心翼翼地摆弄那台已经填满了上好丝绸与金线的大型刺绣机。听到你走近的脚步，她猛地缩回了手，尖利的指甲划破了薄如蝉翼的面料。{/n}“啊，{name}，你来了。我……我想谢谢你送给我这么一份意外的大礼。刺绣，我从来没有尝试过刺绣。这真是……太有意思了。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia untersucht vorsichtig die große Stickmaschine, in die bereits edelstes Garn aus Seide und Gold eingelegt ist. Als du dich näherst, zieht sie erschrocken die Hand zurück, und ihre scharfen Klauen durchtrennen das schimmernde Garn.{/n} "Ah, {name}, Ihr seid schon hier. Ich ... wollte Euch für dieses unerwartete Geschenk danken. Stickerei ... Ich habe so etwas noch nie gemacht. Es sieht ... interessant aus."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia is tentatively examining the large embroidery machine already loaded with the finest silk and gold thread. As you approach, she jerks her hand away in fright, and her sharp claws slice the translucent fabric.{/n} "Ah, {name}, you are here already. I... wanted to thank you for this unexpected gift. Embroidery... I have never engaged in anything of this sort before. It looks... most curious."

Als du dich näherst, zieht sie erschrocken die Hand zurück, und ihre scharfen Klauen durchtrennen das schimmernde Garn.{/n} "Ah, {name}, Ihr seid schon hier. Ich ... wollte Euch für dieses unerwartete Geschenk danken. Stickerei ... Ich habe so etwas noch nie gemacht. Es sieht ... interessant aus."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia examine avec hésitation l'énorme machine à broder déjà chargée de la soie la plus fine et de fil d'or. Surprise par votre approche, elle a un mouvement brusque de la main et ses griffes acérées tranchent le tissu translucide.{/n} « Ah, {name}, vous êtes déjà là. Je... voulais vous remercier pour ce cadeau inattendu. La broderie... Je ne me suis jamais essayée à une telle activité. Ça m'a l'air assez... étrange. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia is tentatively examining the large embroidery machine already loaded with the finest silk and gold thread. As you approach, she jerks her hand away in fright, and her sharp claws slice the translucent fabric.{/n} "Ah, {name}, you are here already. I... wanted to thank you for this unexpected gift. Embroidery... I have never engaged in anything of this sort before. It looks... most curious."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia examine avec hésitation l'énorme machine à broder déjà chargée de la soie la plus fine et de fil d'or. Surprise par votre approche, elle a un mouvement brusque de la main et ses griffes acérées tranchent le tissu translucide.{/n} « Ah, {name}, vous êtes déjà là. Je... voulais vous remercier pour ce cadeau inattendu. La broderie... Je ne me suis jamais essayée à une telle activité. Ça m'a l'air assez... étrange. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia examina tímidamente la gran máquina de bordar cargada con finos hilos de seda y oro. Cuando te acercas aparta la mano asustada y sus afiladas garras cortan la tela traslúcida.{/n} «Ah, {name}, ya está aquí. Quería agradecerle este regalo tan inesperado. Bordar... Nunca había hecho nada por el estilo. Parece... interesante».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia is tentatively examining the large embroidery machine already loaded with the finest silk and gold thread. As you approach, she jerks her hand away in fright, and her sharp claws slice the translucent fabric.{/n} "Ah, {name}, you are here already. I... wanted to thank you for this unexpected gift. Embroidery... I have never engaged in anything of this sort before. It looks... most curious."

Nunca había hecho nada por el estilo. Parece... interesante».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアはためらいがちに、既に最高級の絹と金の糸を積み込んだ大きな刺繍機を調べた。あなたが近づくと、彼女は恐怖に震える手を離し、彼女の鋭い爪が透き通った生地を切る。{/n}「ああ、{name}様、ここにいらっしゃったのですね。あたくしは…この思いがけない贈り物へのお礼がしたいと思っていました。刺繍…あたくしはこれまで、このようなものに関わるとは思ってもみませんでした。これは…とても興味深いです」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia is tentatively examining the large embroidery machine already loaded with the finest silk and gold thread. As you approach, she jerks her hand away in fright, and her sharp claws slice the translucent fabric.{/n} "Ah, {name}, you are here already. I... wanted to thank you for this unexpected gift. Embroidery... I have never engaged in anything of this sort before. It looks... most curious."

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia; en kaliteli ipeklerle, altın ipliklerle dolu, büyük dikiş makinesini çekingen bir tavırla inceliyor. Senin yaklaşmanla elini korkuyla geri çekince keskin pençeleri, saydam kumaşı yırtıyor.{/n} "Ah, {name}. Geldin demek. Bu sıra dışı armağan için... Teşekkür etmek istemiştim. Ben daha önce hiç... Dikiş yapmamıştım. Son derece... İlginç duruyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia is tentatively examining the large embroidery machine already loaded with the finest silk and gold thread. Embroidery... I have never engaged in anything of this sort before. It looks... most curious."
